mapper.select: SELECT USER_NUMBER, USER_EMAIL, USER_NICKNAME, USER_PHONE, PROVIDER, PROVIDER_ID, PROFILE_PIC FROM DR_USER WHERE PROVIDER_ID = #{providerId} -- 컬럼명 대소문자 확인 (PROVIDER_ID)
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO DR_USER ( USER_EMAIL, USER_PW, USER_NICKNAME, USER_PHONE, PROVIDER, PROVIDER_ID, PROFILE_PIC, USER_STATUS -- USER_STATUS 추가 (기본값 또는 '구글회원' 등) ) VALUES ( #{accountEmail}, #{userPw}, #{name}, #{phone}, #{provider}, #{providerId}, #{profilePic}, '구글회원' -- USER_STATUS 값 설정 (예시) )
